text: Onnaamvattam Kandappol is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by KK Haridas, starring Roque Tharakan and Praveena in the lead role. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/rating_onnam-vattam-kandappol.htm ==Cast== * Roque Tharakan as Unni * Praveena as Sophia * Sudheesh as Nakulan * Harishree Ashokan as Pallathaan * Jagathy Sreekumar as Kariyachan/ Karjeeth Burgman * Kalabhavan Mani as Rajani Muthu * Indrans as Butler Kesari * Madhu as Prathapa Varma * Spadikam George as Doctor * KTS Padannayil as Perumal * A. C. Zainuddin as SI Shukkoor * Kanakalatha as Sofia's Aunt * Vettukili Prakash as Paappi * Kalabhavan Santhosh as Mental patient ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films Category:Films directed by K. K. Haridas
title: Onnaamvattam Kandappol
